howToUseSection.title: How to Use Proxy Detector Tool
howToUseSection.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to check if your connection is using a VPN, Proxy, or Tor network. Our tool provides instant results with detailed analysis.

steps.title: Check Your Current Connection
steps.description: Click the "Detect My Connection" button to analyze your current IP address and connection type.
features: Instant detection of your real IP address
Checks for VPN, Proxy, or Tor usage

steps.title: Check Any IP Address
steps.description: Enter any IP address in the input field to check if it's using a proxy or VPN service.
features: Supports both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses

steps.title: Analyze the Results
steps.description: Review comprehensive information about the IP address including location, ISP, and risk analysis.

steps.title: Understand Detection Types
steps.description: Learn what each detection type means and how it affects your online privacy and security.

tips.title: Fast Detection
tips.description: Results appear in seconds with real-time analysis

tips.title: Accurate Data
tips.description: Powered by reliable IP intelligence database

tips.title: Privacy First
tips.description: We don't store or log any IP addresses

types.title: VPN Detection
types.description: Identifies if you're using a Virtual Private Network to mask your real IP address.
indicators: IP belongs to known VPN provider

types.title: Proxy Detection
types.description: Checks if your connection is routed through a proxy server.

types.title: Tor Detection
types.description: Determines if you're using the Tor network for anonymous browsing.

types.title: Datacenter Detection
types.description: Identifies if your IP originates from a datacenter rather than a residential ISP.

faqs.question: What is a proxy detector tool?
faqs.answer: A proxy detector tool is an online service that analyzes IP addresses to determine if they are using proxy servers, VPNs, or Tor networks. It helps identify masked connections and provides detailed information about the IP's origin, location, and connection type.

faqs.question: How accurate is the proxy detection?
faqs.answer: Our proxy detector uses advanced IP intelligence databases and real-time analysis to provide highly accurate results. The detection accuracy is typically above 95% for identifying VPNs, proxies, and Tor connections. However, some sophisticated proxy services may occasionally evade detection.

faqs.question: Can I check any IP address?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can check any public IP address (both IPv4 and IPv6) using our tool. Simply enter the IP address in the input field and click "Check IP" to get detailed analysis including proxy detection, location information, and risk assessment.

faqs.question: Is my data stored or logged?
faqs.answer: No, we prioritize your privacy. We do not store, log, or track any IP addresses that you check using our tool. All queries are processed in real-time and no personal data is retained on our servers.

faqs.question: What is the risk score?
faqs.answer: The risk score is a numerical value (0-100) that indicates the likelihood of suspicious or fraudulent activity associated with an IP address. A score of 0 means clean connection, while higher scores indicate potential risks such as VPN usage, proxy servers, or datacenter IPs.

faqs.question: Why would I need to detect proxies?
faqs.answer: Proxy detection is useful for various purposes: preventing fraud, enforcing geographic restrictions, identifying bot traffic, verifying user authenticity, protecting against account abuse, and ensuring compliance with regional content licensing agreements.
